attributes.action: ban the group "edl" and other groups associated with the same mission
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want this group to be banned because it is causing racial hatred in the ethnic communities of britain. also to be fair "islam4uk" was banned and edl regarded that as spreading racial hatred and because of terrorism. edl are causing riots and hatred in alot of place, which is making the police waste time and arrest people when they could be doing better things.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
